caption.center: EDWARD R. CONWAY, p.a. EDWARD R. CONWAY, JR. v. CARL G.

opinion.posture: Motion of defendants to dismiss appeal is denied without prejudice. The plaintiffs' motion to permit the record below to be transmitted and filed after the expiration of the time allowed or fixed is granted.
opinion.attorneys:
Brian J. Sarault, Charles J. Rogers, for plaintiffs.
Michael T. F. Wallor, for defendants.
